room.name: Living Room
room.description: This room is fairly small and comfortably furnished. There is a wooden cabinet in one corner, and a roaring fire in another.

action.name: Look inside
action.message: You look inside the wooden cabinet. There isn't much inside, just some old photographs, and a lot of dust.

action.name: Look at
action.message: You gaze into the fire. There are wooden logs, blackening in the heat.

action.name: A wooden door to the bedroom
action.message: You walk through a small wooden door.

room.name: A small bedroom
room.description: A small but comfortable bedroom, with a large bed against one wall, and a rug on the floor at the foot.

action.name: Look at
action.message: This bed has been left neatly made.

action.name: The bedroom door
action.message: You walk out of the bedroom.

room.name: Kitchen
room.description: A well stocked kitchen, with utensils hanging up on one wall, and countertops running around the edges.
